welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brownsburg! This charming city is known for its friendly community and scenic views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Brownsburg has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Indianapolis International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Indianapolis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis Executive Airport is a small and efficient building, offering a comfortable waiting area and basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Comfort Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mount Comfort Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
